name: Environment / Base Projects
description: Working in a more professional context means, that there are some things you need to share in your group. These projects should help you with that.

projects.title: Project Template
projects.subtitle: create a project template for your group

projects.title: Runtime Environment
projects.subtitle: create a common environment for your groups projects to share configuration and logging

name: Tool Projects
description: Projects that describe tools that might be of use. They do not become part of your groups code base, but help to achieve better results faster.

projects.title: Database Based Code Generator
projects.subtitle: A code generator that reads a database table structure and generates code (in a window) for copy and paste

projects.title: SQL Code Formatter
projects.subtitle: I bet your team knows a thousand ways to format the sql. Maybe a common standard would help.

projects.title: Shared Library
projects.subtitle: Your team needs to achieve certain things in a common way. A library that supports them doing that can reduce trouble and code.

projects.title: Style Guide
projects.subtitle: A style guide that builds the html,css and javascript you need and has a good documentation, so that your apps all look and behave alike

projects.title: Provisioning Toolset
projects.subtitle: You need a way to provision production, test and development environments

name: Projects
description: Try these projects together and grow in understanding

projects.title: Random Stuff Generator
projects.subtitle: Generate random numbers, passwords and animals

projects.title: Password Manager
projects.subtitle: Write a password manager

projects.title: Vocabulary Training
projects.subtitle: Create a vocabulary trainer that supports a diverse set of different question types and learning methods

projects.title: Time Tracker
projects.subtitle: Create a tool to record your working time

projects.title: Batch convert file encodings
projects.subtitle: Mass update file encodings

projects.title: Web scraper
projects.subtitle: write a sophisticated web scraper

projects.title: Email rule engine
projects.subtitle: automate sorting and cleaning up your mails

projects.title: Splitting costs in a group of people
Markdown Enumeration
projects.subtitle: a tool for working with number groups in markdown files

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.subtitle: Create a game of Tic-Tac-Toe complete with an AI you can play against

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.subtitle: Create a network chat application

projects.title: Cooking Helper
projects.subtitle: Create an app that helps you buy the right ingredients for a set of meals you want to eat

projects.title: Organizational View
projects.subtitle: A display, edit and search thing for an organizational structure

projects.title: Buy lunch for a bunch using mixed payments
projects.subtitle: Buy lunch for a team application

projects.title: Principles
projects.subtitle: Train some principles of software development

projects.title: Form Builder
projects.subtitle: Create a flexible database environment that is configurable using a ui

projects.title: Kanban Task Manager
projects.subtitle: Create a task management application with a kanban like view

projects.title: Kanban Task Manager
projects.subtitle: A full blown rights management

projects.title: Kanban Task Manager
projects.subtitle: A library to parse command line arguments as if they would be routes

projects.title: Sodoku Solver
projects.subtitle: Write an app that can solve sodoku riddles

projects.title: Create a deployment and hosting pipeline for a NOP-Application
projects.subtitle: create a simple 'no operation' app and host and secure it professionally

projects.title: Convert Source Code To Json
projects.subtitle: a scanner/parser that will convert your code to easily processable json for analytics

projects.title: Generic Build
projects.subtitle: A generic build script, that autodetects the contents of the repository / directory

projects.title: Deployment Tooling
projects.subtitle: A deployment infrastructure for continuous deployment

projects.title: Meta Cloud Tool
projects.subtitle: A tool to manage virtual machines

projects.title: Theory Of Constraints
projects.subtitle: find a dilemma and create a logic tree as a map to help solve the problem in a specific situation (evaporating cloud/current reality tree)
